description: PIMS 3642 Sustainable Management of Biodiversity in Thailand's Production Landscape

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The project will directly address these barriers through the three major components of the project: 1) Building  national capacity for support of Biodiversity Business; 2) Piloting Community-based Social Enterprises (CbSE) in valuable Eco-regions; and 3) Mainstreaming Biodiversity Business into the supply chains of high-value consumer markets.
subproject.title: PIMS 3642 BD PPG: BEDO
